title: Jardim (Dr. Nuno Ferreira)
body: He was born in Funchal on January 27, 1851, and graduated from the Faculty of Law at the University of Coimbra in 1874. He has practiced law in the districts of Madeira with remarkable brilliance and proficiency, bringing to light some of the legal works in which his action as a distinguished lawyer had to intervene.

1874: Graduation from the Faculty of Law at the University of Coimbra
